def is_for_tv(remote:item):
    # Determine if the remote control is meant for the TV
    symbol is_tv_remote=exists tv: item : is_television(tv) and close(remote, tv)
    return is_tv_remote

behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote:item):
    body:
        assert is_on(remote)
        # Ensure the remote control is turned on
        if is_for_tv(remote):
            bind tv: item where:
                is_television(tv) and close(remote, tv)
            achieve is_on(tv)
            # Turn on the TV using the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and is_on(remote_control)
        # Select the remote control that is turned on
        turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control)

behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control:item, television:item):
    body:
        achieve close(remote_control, television)
        # Ensure the remote control is close to the TV for effective use
        achieve is_on(remote_control)
        # Ensure the remote control is switched on
        achieve is_on(television)
        # Turn on the television

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control]==2052
        # Select the remote control with ID 2052
        
        bind television: item where:
            is_television(television)
        # Select the television

        turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control, television)
